titles.title: Obligation of Funds Transparency Act of 2005
A bill to prohibit Federal agencies from obligating funds for appropriations earmarks included only in congressional reports, and for other purposes.
Obligation of Funds Transparency Act of 2005
Reform Earmarks Process bill

bill.summary: Obligation of Funds Transparency Act of 2005 - Prohibits a Federal agency from obligating funds made available in an appropriation Act to implement an earmark that is included in a congressional report accompanying such Act, unless the earmark is also included in that Act.
